import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../../assets/styles/login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[navigate]=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});if(!response.ok){const errorData=await response.json();console.error('Error response data in Login page',errorData);return;}const data=await response.json();console.log('Response recieved',data);navigate('/');}catch(err){console.log("Error in Login Page",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Login Page "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?
